CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound cadmium
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding cadmium turns every breath into a struggle. Lungs burn, vision narrows, and the world grows faint — but the stolen air flows into the metalmind. Store enough, and one day you’ll breathe freely while others choke.
